title: #70 - Hotline Edition: Am I Being Ghosted on Snapchat?
description:
We’re answering YOUR questions again this week! If you have a question you’d like to personally ask Maria, be sure to follow her on Insta to know when the hotline will open up next! @MatchmakerMaria 

This week, we’re talking about…

  • How do I know if someone is stringing me along? How do I trust my gut?
  • Am I being ghosted by someone?
  • How do I not move too quickly when I’m dating someone new?

Follow Maria on Instagram at http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

If you’d like to learn more about Agape Match’s services or enroll in an upcoming Agape Intensive, visit agapematch.com/services
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
